plugin.name: extra-gestures
plugin._long: A plugin which provides several touchscreen gestures.

option.name: move_fingers
option._long: Number of fingers to press and hold to start interactive move of the view.

option.name: move_delay
option._long: Amount of time in milliseconds to hold fingers before starting interactive move of the view.

option.name: close_fingers
option._long: Number of fingers to tap with to close a window. Set to very high(20) to disable.
